mapper.sql: id, people_code, job_id, job_salary, rank_id, rank_salary, reserve_salary, exam_result, job_allowance, performance_allowance, rent_allowance, house_allowance, work_date, timesheet_status, duty_allowance, extra_allowance, telephone_allowance, traffic_allowance, on_duty_fee, on_duty_date, on_duty_fee_total, property_allowance, extra_job_allowance, temperature_allowance, reissue_fee, medicare, yearly_bonus, gross_salary, life_insurance, job_insurance, health_insurance, annuity, house_fund, expense, tax, net_income, pay_date

id, code, name, job_id, job_salary, rank_id, rank_salary, reserve_salary, job_allowance, performance_allowance, rent_allowance, house_allowance, duty_allowance, extra_allowance, telephone_allowance, traffic_allowance, on_duty_fee, property_allowance, extra_job_allowance, temperature_allowance, reissue_fee, medicare, yearly_bonus, life_insurance, job_insurance, health_insurance, annuity, house_fund, last_update_date, life_insurance_base, job_insurance_base, wound_insurance_base, birth_insurance_base, health_insurance_base, annuity_base
mapper.update:
update people_total
name = #{peopleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job_id = #{jobId, jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_salary = #{jobSalary, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rank_id = #{rankId, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rank_salary = #{rankSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reserve_salary = #{reserveSalary, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
job_allowance = #{jobAllowance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
performance_allowance = #{performanceAllowance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rent_allowance = #{rentAllowance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
house_allowance = #{houseAllowance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
duty_allowance = #{dutyAllowance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
extra_allowance = #{extraAllowance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
telephone_allowance = #{telephoneAllowance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
traffic_allowance = #{trafficAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
on_duty_fee = #{onDutyFee, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
property_allowance = #{propertyAllowance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
extra_job_allowance = #{extraJobAllowance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
temperature_allowance = #{temperatureAllowance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reissue_fee = #{reissueFee, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
medicare = #{medicare, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
yearly_bonus = #{yearlyBonus, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
life_insurance = #{lifeInsurance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
job_insurance = #{jobInsurance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
health_insurance = #{healthInsurance, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
annuity = #{annuity, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
house_fund = #{houseFund, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
life_insurance_base = #{lifeInsuranceBase, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
job_insurance_base = #{jobInsuranceBase, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
wound_insurance_base = #{woundInsuranceBase, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
birth_insurance_base = #{birthInsuranceBase, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
health_insurance_base = #{healthInsuranceBase, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
annuity_base = #{annuityBase, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.people_code, p.name as people_name, p.age as age, t.job_id, j.job_category as job_category, j.job_level as job_level, t.job_salary, t.rank_id, r.rank_level as rank_level, t.rank_salary, t.reserve_salary, t.exam_result, t.job_allowance, t.performance_allowance, t.rent_allowance, t.house_allowance, t.work_date, t.timesheet_status, t.duty_allowance, t.extra_allowance, t.telephone_allowance, t.traffic_allowance, t.on_duty_fee, t.on_duty_date, t.on_duty_fee_total, t.property_allowance, t.extra_job_allowance, t.temperature_allowance, t.reissue_fee, t.medicare, t.yearly_bonus, t.gross_salary, t.life_insurance, t.job_insurance, t.health_insurance, t.annuity, t.house_fund, t.expense, t.tax, t.net_income, t.pay_date FROM people_salary t LEFT JOIN people_total p ON t.people_code = p.code LEFT JOIN job j ON t.job_id = j.id LEFT JOIN rank r ON t.rank_id = r.id
and t.people_code LIKE concat('%',#{condition.peopleCode},'%')
and p.name LIKE concat('%',#{condition.peopleName},'%')
ORDER BY t.pay_date desc LIMIT #{from}, #{size}

select count(t.id) count FROM people_salary t LEFT JOIN people_total p ON t.people_code = p.code LEFT JOIN job j ON t.job_id = j.id LEFT JOIN rank r ON t.rank_id = r.id
and t.people_code LIKE concat('%',#{condition.peopleCode},'%')
and p.name LIKE concat('%',#{condition.peopleName},'%')

mapper.update: update people_salary set people_code = #{peopleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_salary = #{jobSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rank_id = #{rankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rank_salary = #{rankSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, reserve_salary = #{reserveSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, exam_result = #{examResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_allowance = #{jobAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, performance_allowance = #{performanceAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rent_allowance = #{rentAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, house_allowance = #{houseAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, work_date = #{workDate,jdbcType=DATE}, timesheet_status = #{timesheetStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, duty_allowance = #{dutyAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, extra_allowance = #{extraAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, telephone_allowance = #{telephoneAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, traffic_allowance = #{trafficAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, on_duty_fee = #{onDutyFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, on_duty_date = #{onDutyDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, on_duty_fee_total = #{onDutyFeeTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, property_allowance = #{propertyAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, extra_job_allowance = #{extraJobAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, temperature_allowance = #{temperatureAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, reissue_fee = #{reissueFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, medicare = #{medicare,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, yearly_bonus = #{yearlyBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gross_salary = #{grossSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, life_insurance = #{lifeInsurance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, job_insurance = #{jobInsurance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, health_insurance = #{healthInsurance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, annuity = #{annuity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, house_fund = #{houseFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, expense = #{expense,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tax = #{tax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, net_income = #{netIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into people_salary ( people_code, job_id, job_salary, rank_id, rank_salary, reserve_salary, exam_result, job_allowance, performance_allowance, rent_allowance, house_allowance, work_date, timesheet_status, duty_allowance, extra_allowance, telephone_allowance, traffic_allowance, on_duty_fee, on_duty_date, on_duty_fee_total, property_allowance, extra_job_allowance, temperature_allowance, reissue_fee, medicare, yearly_bonus, gross_salary, life_insurance, job_insurance, health_insurance, annuity, house_fund, expense, tax, net_income, pay_date) values
( #{item.peopleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.jobSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.rankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.rankSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.reserveSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.examResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jobAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.performanceAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.rentAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.houseAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.workDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.timesheetStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.dutyAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.extraAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.telephoneAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.trafficAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.onDutyFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.onDutyDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.onDutyFeeTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.propertyAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.extraJobAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.temperatureAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.reissueFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.medicare,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.yearlyBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.grossSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.lifeInsurance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.jobInsurance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.healthInsurance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.annuity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.houseFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.expense,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.tax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.netIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.payDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
